Posts.Content: Hi my mom is 72 she has recently 11 days ago had a right mysectomy .She had invasive ductal carcinoma stage 3.She had a sentanal node biopsy all nodes negative.Just got tests back and this is what it says ductal carcinoma in situ grade 3 necrosis present comedo pattern margins now clear .six lymph nodes all negative for metastic carcinoma ..this i am confused on estrogen receptor..negative,positive internal control ...progesterone receptor negative positive internal control ..herceptest (DAKO)equivocal,40%,1+/weak to 2+moderate specimen sent for florescence in situ hybridization......Im confused does this mean additional things are needed like chemo,radiation and or hormone therapy.She is not sure if this is good or bad and we are  a little confuused ..I'm just tired from lack of sleep from taking care of her !! She does have an appt with an onchology in 2 weeks HELP!!! I need  it explained this has all happened so fast she has been very depressed and I am not understanding.She asked the dr today what her survival rate is ..??? any help would be such a blessing!! thank you tara
Posts.Title: my moms test results?? help

Posts.Content: yes that helps alot .She has not been following her results and everything .I have done alot of research but some things are hard to understand.She asked me if her cancer could or has spread to other parts her body bacause it it a fast growing type of cancer (being that it was not in her lypph nodes.I asked about pet or ct scan for her body .she has had alot of coughing and the dr said her chest xray showed fine is there any blood or scan testing that can give her/us any more comfort that nothing has spread.So would radiation be beneficial.I am thinking they will put her on herception.but we are still waiting to find out also can you recommend any good support groups?she has been very depressed thank you so much and god bless
Posts.Title: my moms test results?? help

Posts.Content: hi i need mor help we met with an onchologist today and they are saying she would not respond to either hormone therapy or radiation.they said she needs chemo 1 treatment every 3 weeks for 3 months .They say Adriamycin.She is 72 and it has only been 3 weeks since her surgery and she is very tired most of the time .She really doesn't know what decision to make they said the chemo is more of an incsurance that the cancer cells haven't spread but im worried if she can take the treatment.HELP .They said 70% it wont show up but a 30 % it might she is confused and not sure what to do .she has alot of nausia from pain meds and it worries me that this wont weaken her more please give me some help.They still have said a cat scan or pet scan wont show anything or help but we were really hoping no chemo and Im not sure what to tell her she has asked for my help and I have been her care giver this whole time but I have 2 young kids and Im concerned about her weakened immune system now then we add chemo yikes .I am overwhelmed and after loosing my dad from pancriotic cancer my gfather lung cancer and gma from colon cancer I dont want to miss anything my mom means everything to me help me please I need advise thanks tara
Posts.Title: my moms test results?? help

Posts.Content: On 3/11/2007 Witchdoctor wrote: oops!     Your mom had invasive cancer, somehow I missed that and concentrated on the DCIS.  She will need chemotherapy and maybe Radiation basshe ed on the details of her original tumor.  Size, margins (close or wide etc.  Sorry for my confusion.she is just finishing her 4th round of chemo she tolrated it ok she is very tired and weak...she wants to know what next how does she know she is in remission? The oncologist told her he wanted to due 4 more but at 72 how much increase does it give her?  sh
Posts.Title: my moms test results?? help

Posts.Content: Hi my name is Tara.My mom is 72 her nipple started bleeding 3 days before xmas.she had her mammogram and it came back clear 3 weeks before.She had a sono and a duct gram.She had surgery monday to take out and biopsy her ductsi asked if she could have centinnal node biopsy.they did not do.Ok her are reports.infiltrating duct carcinoma (grade 111/111)  invasive tumer meas.3.8x3.2x3 cm  in sutro component high grade,cribform,comedo,and solid type,grade111/111,necrosis present.  extensive intraductal component  angiolymhatic invasion: present   margins  tumor extends to margin in sections a7 and a 12  block a7 sent for further studies.   fibrous tissue no tumer .needless to say we are overwhelmed she is inover all good health and after loosing my dad 7 yrs ago .(pancriotic cancer) we are scared .I have a 14 (g) and 6 son we is grandmas love he came right after my dad died and well you know.Her surgean recommended a total mysectomy(excuse all my spelling I am shocked today) and need to know how bad it REALLY is.I have books but...they will do a cnb during surgery and take nodes out as needed.My thought is they will.She has been coughing for 7 months was diog.with sleep apnea and her right shoulder often hurts they said artrit.Has any one out there been through this and could help,have I missed anything  .i know they will know more when nodes are biopsy but if it has spread what is her time prog. and what will she be facing .Thet talked to us about radiation and tomaxifin but not so sure on chemo with her age .Would love ANY IMFO OR HELP OR HOPE thank you and may gad bless everyone of you strong strong people. Tara

Posts.Title: I need more imfo PLEASE HELP

Posts.Content: On 7/5/2007 Sally55 wrote: Hi Tara I think that your mom is depressed and might need an antidepressant from her onco ( oncologist) It is never good to isolate oneself. As far as being in remission and how you can tell. The onco usually does circulating tumer cells test as well as a tumor marker test. For the tumer cell one anything over 5 is not a good sign, and the tumer marker usually is 0 to 35 and anything over 35 results that the cancer is still present in the body.also the tests that are by blood test like thwe CA-125 etc. Tell your Mom to get out and do somethings even if it is for a little while, Tara you can also get people to call her and to have people write cards and letters of encouragement to her to help her not be so isolated. Also you can put cards out every day for her that people have sent to help her be encouraged.I hope this helps....Take care and GBUthank you so much..she is taking paxil but she just is very tired ! Are all these blood tests ?
Posts.Title: How do you Know When You Are In Remission?

Posts.Content: Hi My mom who was diag. in dec with dcis .Had a full mysectomy and 6 nodes all neg is just finishing 4 sessions of chemo .She is 72 she wants to know how do they determine if she is "cancer free"or in remission .she she have any additional tests and what should she "watch" for ?She is also very weak and tired after chemo any ideas on how to help boost her energy level..she would love to start traveling but is way to tired .She wants to have peace of mind that her cancer is gone .how do you kow?She sits home most of the time ..and I really would like her to start enjoyinhg herself so is fearful thast the cancer is not gone and seems depressed and isolates herself..any help or imfo would be great god bless ! tara
